description: ServicePorte is designed to replace fragmented tools with a single business link that customers can use to interact with you instantly. From viewing offerings to ordering and paying, everything happens through one seamless entry point â€” eliminating friction, delays, and manual processes.

Merry Heart empowers individuals to save intentionally, grow their wealth securely, and achieve financial peace through flexible savings plans, transparent management, and consistent returns designed for everyday dreamers.

The MIHRA (Mind Innovation and Health Reform Africa) project was launched by Wellcore Health Initiative, a non-profit committed to transforming mental health in Africa through research, advocacy, digital innovation, and community-driven initiatives. Our objectives reflect a world-class approach to creating sustainable, accessible, and impactful digital health solutions for African youth

Karthlog seamlessly connects physical cards with digital benefits, creating a unique ecosystem for collectors and users. Karthlog cards blend digital currency with collectible art, giving you access to exclusive content, discounts, and a community of creators and collectors.
Dugout is a gameFi(sports) on the solana blockchain. It is an online gaming and decentralized finance platform, creating an in-game economy.
Fullstack advertising web application on the solana blockchain for poynt application. Business and organizations can come to create campaigns to advertise their businesses in the poynt app.
